Text.Page:
I need to keep the animals at bay long enough to reinforce the fences. My training covered a remedy that would drive animals away, but it needs normetal ore as a reagent.

Your assistance would be much appreciated. I've no desire to harm animals unduly. Bring me the normetal and I'll put it to good use.

Your haste is appreciated. I'll coat the ore with blood and...

Phew! What a stench! No wonder animals avoid it.

Thank you, . The Forest Keepers will note your consideration.
If we can't keep the animals away, I'll be forced to kill them. Help me spare their lives and bring me the normetal ore.
